sentences.sentence: He tried to buckle his armours on.
This skill enables you to create plate and chain type armours.
sentences.translation: 这个技能可以让你制造出板甲和锁甲。

sentences.sentence: The Vikings has the best axes from all factions, Vikings has plate armours as well as light armours.
sentences.translation: 维京人由所有阵营中最好的斧头，维京的盔甲像轻盔甲一样。
